tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE encryption_keys (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    key_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    key_value BYTEA NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

Create Table encryption_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    key_id UUID,
    action VARCHAR(20),
    user_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

Create Table encryption_settings (
    setting_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    key_name VARCHAR(50),
    key_value TEXT,
    created_by VARCHAR(50),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE key_access_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    key_id INT NOT NULL,
    component_id INT NOT NULL,
    access_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (key_id) REFERENCES encryption_keys(key_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (component_id) REFERENCES authentication_components(component_id)
);
